section.8: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Narrated Zayd, the client of the Prophet: The Prophet (ï·º) said: If anyone says: "I ask pardon of Allah than Whom there is no deity, the Living, the eternal, and I turn to Him in repentance," he will be pardoned, even if he has fled in time of battle
